UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

role.description: The user's role in the application.

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization the user belongs to. Can be null for new admins.

isVerified.description: Indicates if a vendor or agent is verified. Defaults to false.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: Represents a company or entity using ShiraPay.

orgId.description: The unique ID for the organization.

legalName.description: The legal name of the organization.

primaryContactEmail.description: The primary contact email for the organization.

adminUids.description: An array of user UIDs who are admins of this organization.

departments.description: A list of departments within the organization for invoice routing.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the organization was created.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a payment request and its lifecycle.

status.description: The current status of the transaction lifecycle.

vendorId.description: The UID of the vendor user.

vendorName.description: The cached name of the vendor.

agentId.description: The UID of the agent user who initiated the request.

agentName.description: The cached name of the agent.

adminId.description: The UID of the admin user who approved/rejected.

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization this transaction belongs to.

department.description: The department this transaction was routed to for approval.

rejectionReason.description: The reason an admin rejected the transaction.

paymentError.description: The error message if payment processing failed.

paystackReferenceId.description: The reference ID from the Paystack transaction.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created by the vendor.

paidAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was successfully paid.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information for each user.

/transactions/{transactionId}.description: Stores all payment transaction details and their lifecycle.
